inclusion.criterion: Patient eligible for reconstructive surgery after carcinological excision following a decision taken in a multidisciplinary consultation, and for whom the envisaged oral defect concerns either the soft tissues of the oral cavity and oropharynx, or the mandibular bone
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Coverage by the Social Security system
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Surgical or anesthetic contraindication (physiological age, other proposed therapeutic options)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Subject incapable of full age or deprived of liberty
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient is a 55-year-old man with mild Parkinson's disease. He has hypertension and hypercholesterolemia, but no dementia.
